SECTION_CONTENT: Use personal protective equipment. Wear self-contained breathing apparatus and protective suit. Evacuate personnel to safe areas. Keep people away from and upwind of spill/leak. Ensure adequate ventilation. Avoid contact with skin, eyes and clothing. Avoid release to the environment. See Section 12 for additional ecological information. Soak up with inert absorbent material. Keep in suitable, closed containers for disposal.
